text: Soni Allah apeleche chilandanyo cha Musi (wa Maaka) wawaliji wantunjelele soni wakutamilichika, lyauichililaga lisiki lyakwe mwawinji kuumila malo galigose, nambo wakaaniile indimba ya Allah, basi Allah waupele kupasya chiwaalo chasala ni woga ligongo lya yawaliji (achinsyene musio) ali nkutenda
